sense.def:
Ko vojaki, policisti ali stražniki
patrol an area or building
, z obhodi preverjajo, ali je na nekem območju ali v neki stavbi kaj narobe.

seg.quote: I saw men patrolling the streets with rifles on their backs.
...the policeman who is patrolling in a dangerous area.
An entire platoon was ambushed during a patrol.
The police came in a black patrol car.

sense.def:
Ljudje, ki so
on patrol
, patruljirajo po določenem območju.

seg.quote: Two policemen on patrol saw the boy running away.

sense.def:
A patrol
je skupina vojakov ali vozil, ki patruljirajo na nekem območju.
